altername_name: Diddl in the Cheesecakeland: Diddl en Diddland
name: Diddl im Kaesekuchenland
overview: Diddl im Käsekuchenland is a game for true Diddl fans. Diddl is a German comic strip created by German artist Thomas Goletz in 1990. Diddl is a white Jumping Mouse, with big ears and large pink-soled feet allowing him to jump large distances. Diddl and his friends are featured on various sorts of products such as stationery and collectibles, and also in a range of plush dolls and toys.
